meanings.sent1: After a long day of work, she looked bleareyed from exhaustion.

meanings.sent3: The bleareyed puppy yawned, looking like it had been up all night.
meanings.sent4: The bleareyed sky at sunset painted a beautiful picture over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The bleareyed old man squinted in the bright sunlight, his eyes tired and red.
